channel.title: Media on Trym Nohr Fjørtoft
channel.description: Recent content in Media on Trym Nohr Fjørtoft

item.title: Spør Ekko
item.description: Radio interview in Ekko (in Norwegian) about the ongoing student demonstrations in Serbia and other European countries.

item.title: Farligere enn noensinne
item.description: An interview in Klassekampen (in Norwegian) about the allegations against Frontex’s involvement in illegal pushbacks.

item.title: Interview in Vårt land
item.description: An interview in Vårt Land (in Norwegian) about Front-Lex taking Frontex to the CJEU.

item.title: Morgenbladet
item.description: Interview in Morgenbladet (in Norwegian) about Frontex’s alleged involvement in illegal pushbacks.

item.title: The EU looks to the external borders
item.description: An interview in Klassekampen (in Norwegian) about Frontex and its expanding mandate.
